ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] Digest Number 115
ygData.msgSnippet: How about a topic once a week we can talk about?  Something like grouping, beggers *shivers at them* and how to deal with them. Heck I got to level 14 with my
ygData.messageBody:
How about a topic once a week we can talk about? Something like
grouping, beggers *shivers at them* and how to deal with them.

Heck I got to level 14 with my druid yesterday, walked into Freeport
to get my spells out of the bank. And guess what, I had folks calling
out for SOWS. And one guy told me that he would wait for me to get my
spells at the bank so I could bind him. I got 8pp out of that one. But
still, Man I never seen stuff like that before.

Ranalla the Lost Druid of Prexus and Hates Lavastorm right now.
